meanings.definition: The branch of medicine concerned with the care and treatment of newborn infants.
meanings.sent1: Neonatologies focus on the health of newborn babies.
meanings.sent2: Doctors specializing in neonatologies work in hospitals' neonatal units.
meanings.sent3: The neonatologies team celebrated a successful delivery with a cake shaped like a baby bottle.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to neonatologies was a beacon of hope for many worried parents.
meanings.sent5: The neonatologies department was filled with the soft cries of newborns.

meanings.definition: The study or science of neonatal medicine.
meanings.sent1: Understanding neonatologies requires knowledge of infant health.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in neonatologies aim to improve outcomes for premature babies.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for neonatologies was evident in every lecture.
meanings.sent4: In the world of neonatologies, every tiny detail can make a big difference.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on neonatologies was filled with colorful illustrations of baby development.
